reviews.text:
This was my first time trying Mario's Pizza and I cannot believe it took me this long to try them.
This is a little hole in the wall pick up only place.  Nothing fancy but immediately upon entering I was greeted with a friendly smile!
We ordered 2 double dough pizzas and they were piping hot and ready right on time.

The pizza was excellent, great sauce, fresh toppings, so many options and the crust was delicious!!
I am extremely satisfied with service and pizza... I'm for sure making this my go to place for pizza!!

I have mixed feelings about this.  The pizza is very good, but the pasta dishes are so greasy that it soaked through the bag and stained my seat during the two minute ride home. This happened multiple times.  The pasta dishes were very good, except for the excessive grease.
Best gluten free pizza around! I ask for a bit more well done and it even beats the fancy wood fired joints by a long shot!
The best pizza place around!! We have been going to Mario‚Äôs for years and have never been disappointed. The pizza is always full of flavor and fresh and the staff is so friendly!

Mario‚Äôs is a legendary pizza joint. I‚Äôve ordered from here several times over the past couple years and I‚Äôve never been disappointed. So much better than Rosati‚Äôs, and much more affordable too!

recentReviews.text:
This was my first time trying Mario's Pizza and I cannot believe it took me this long to try them.
This is a little hole in the wall pick up only place.  Nothing fancy but immediately upon entering I was greeted with a friendly smile!
We ordered 2 double dough pizzas and they were piping hot and ready right on time.

The pizza was excellent, great sauce, fresh toppings, so many options and the crust was delicious!!
I am extremely satisfied with service and pizza... I'm for sure making this my go to place for pizza!!

I have mixed feelings about this.  The pizza is very good, but the pasta dishes are so greasy that it soaked through the bag and stained my seat during the two minute ride home. This happened multiple times.  The pasta dishes were very good, except for the excessive grease.
Pizza and sandwiches are absolutely delicious and Mario is one of the nicest people I've met
Family favorite. Been coming here for years and years. Every time I am home I make the family order!
Ordered a side of coleslaw and received just cabbage.
Best gluten free pizza around! I ask for a bit more well done and it even beats the fancy wood fired joints by a long shot!

detailedReviews.author: Ginger76 76
detailedReviews.text:
This was my first time trying Mario's Pizza and I cannot believe it took me this long to try them.
This is a little hole in the wall pick up only place.  Nothing fancy but immediately upon entering I was greeted with a friendly smile!
We ordered 2 double dough pizzas and they were piping hot and ready right on time.

The pizza was excellent, great sauce, fresh toppings, so many options and the crust was delicious!!
I am extremely satisfied with service and pizza... I'm for sure making this my go to place for pizza!!

detailedReviews.author: Dave Simpson
detailedReviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this.  The pizza is very good, but the pasta dishes are so greasy that it soaked through the bag and stained my seat during the two minute ride home. This happened multiple times.  The pasta dishes were very good, except for the excessive grease.

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Niketopoulos
detailedReviews.text: Pizza and sandwiches are absolutely delicious and Mario is one of the nicest people I've met

detailedReviews.author: Brandon Kochen
detailedReviews.text: Family favorite. Been coming here for years and years. Every time I am home I make the family order!

detailedReviews.author: K K
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a side of coleslaw and received just cabbage.

detailedReviews.author: steve myers
detailedReviews.text: Best gluten free pizza around! I ask for a bit more well done and it even beats the fancy wood fired joints by a long shot!

detailedReviews.author: John Laurx
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza.  Great service.

detailedReviews.author: steve cecala
detailedReviews.text: Always great!

detailedReviews.author: Andrew Wahrman
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jessie Zepeda
detailedReviews.text: I love this place,, i will never order from Rosati‚Äôs again, Rosati‚Äôs overcharged and coupons never worked, Mario has great pizza better than Rosati‚Äòs and coupons always work. The owner is awesome and the employees are very very nice every time I order on the phone.

detailedReviews.author: Kourtlyn Mikel
detailedReviews.text: The best pizza place around!! We have been going to Mario‚Äôs for years and have never been disappointed. The pizza is always full of flavor and fresh and the staff is so friendly!

detailedReviews.author: J
detailedReviews.text:
Great pizza, especially well done!!! I ordered a thin crust for the first time the other day and they did not dissapoint!!!
MY NEW GO TO!!!

detailedReviews.author: B Wallis
detailedReviews.text: Thin and crispy pizza never disappoints! The service is fast and friendly and the delivery is always on time.

detailedReviews.author: Bman1629
detailedReviews.text: Mario‚Äôs is a legendary pizza joint. I‚Äôve ordered from here several times over the past couple years and I‚Äôve never been disappointed. So much better than Rosati‚Äôs, and much more affordable too!

detailedReviews.author: Devin pickenpack
detailedReviews.text: Just ordered extra large pizza and wing so fire sauce on point wings cooked perfectly crispy just all around fire

detailedReviews.author: Ed Harding
detailedReviews.text: The pizza was hot and tasted great.  Nice people

detailedReviews.author: Urooj Ali
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza ever!!

detailedReviews.author: Dan Hawbaker
detailedReviews.text: Just staying there for work Pizza is great wings are good lasagna is to die for great job there guys

detailedReviews.author: Alex Correa
detailedReviews.text: In Aurora looking for good pizza? Venture out to North Aurora, and Mario's won't disappoint. I've been there a few times already and will be back again. The pizza is great, and the fries are good  to go.

detailedReviews.author: Rainbow (Leo)
detailedReviews.text:
Mario in the kitchen always makes our pizza. We come down from Torrington/Winsted area just for Mario‚Äôs Awesome Pizza . I request Mario to make our pizza because it‚Äôs just the best. we like to order thin crust with lots of vegetables.
I‚Äôm handicapped and it‚Äôs easy to get in and out of the restaurant. . We‚Äôve eaten the eggplant and the lasagna and the chef salad and the pasta Fagioli soup which is available daily . It‚Äôs very good as well. It‚Äôs the best Pizza around. Mario used to work in Bacco‚Äôs kitchen and Baccos is what I grew up with as did my dad . They were the best. Now we have Mario‚Äôs .

detailedReviews.author: MJ Shepherd
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôve finally found a great thin crust pizza! This will definitely be my go to. I have to go back and try their bbq!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jim Lund
detailedReviews.text: The pizza and the pasta are fantastic at Marios! Marios is our go to place for Pizza in the NorthWest Aurora area!

detailedReviews.author: Scott Cipolla
detailedReviews.text: The pizza, apps, and soup are all delicious! The gentleman that has taken our phone orders is very friendly. We will continue to order from Mario‚Äôs.

detailedReviews.author: Melanie
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely love this place. Being an Italian myself, I have overly high standards, but this place meets them every time!  We usually order the spaghetti with meat sauce, thin crust pizza, and cannolis. Even their salads are great. Definitely give them a try! Their app is very easy to use as well. It‚Äôs called Slice and you can reorder any past order by clicking one button!!

Update: their Tiramisu is to die for!! Definitely have to try it!

detailedReviews.author: Antonio Qui√±ones
detailedReviews.text: Food is great, service is excellent. We have never ate in, but it looks inviting.

detailedReviews.author: George Griggs
detailedReviews.text: To go only (or delivery). Pizza was delicious. Had it again 3 days later!

detailedReviews.author: Roman Martyn
detailedReviews.text: Good quality pizza. Sauce, cheese and good and flavourful sausage.

detailedReviews.author: Amy Laughead
detailedReviews.text: Mario's has a delicious thin crust pizza. I usually get cheese and sausage. I also like the deep dish, thick crust, and yummy. Great pizza and service!

detailedReviews.author: Janet Wennmacher
detailedReviews.text: Prices have gone up, just like everything else, but still Great pizza, worth every penny.

detailedReviews.author: Ant. Boogi
detailedReviews.text: North Aurora's best pie. It's our favorite pizza place, Mario is a stand up guy. Get the thin crust 20' and the appetizer platter.

detailedReviews.author: T VK
detailedReviews.text: They offer great coupons pretty often. Got one for a free 14" pizza and ordered a couple appetizers. Wings, mozza sticks and pizza were all delicious. Would recommend

detailedReviews.author: Sandy Smith
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and fast delivery!

detailedReviews.author: Jess S
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is delicious.  I received the wrong order and they made it right with my correct order.  The pizza was amazing looking and tasting.

detailedReviews.author: Marisa Connelly
detailedReviews.text: Marios makes the best pizza. I love the tasty sauce and sausage on thin n crispy crust!

detailedReviews.author: Daniel Sowizrol
detailedReviews.text: Excellent pizza , friendly service

detailedReviews.author: Charlesteen Lane
detailedReviews.text: This is the best pizza place ever. My family eat here a lot. Pizza taste amazing and it‚Äôs always made fresh.

detailedReviews.author: Rayna Vogen
detailedReviews.text: I love coming here! They are always welcoming and have amazing food!

detailedReviews.author: War Bot 3000
detailedReviews.text: Been searching around for a good pizzeria after the one I used to order from became a big disappointment. Finally found it! Mario's Pizza has amazing pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Newman
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was fresh and right in time

detailedReviews.author: ricky wilson
detailedReviews.text: Very friendly, great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Steve Podany
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!!! The crust is awesome, great quality toppings. Always consistent quality. I‚Äôve had a lot of pizza all over Chicagoland and I think this pizza ranks pretty high against many others.

detailedReviews.author: Toni E
detailedReviews.text: This pizza is the best!

detailedReviews.author: Chloey Myers
detailedReviews.text: Great food the people are so nice and I‚Äôve never had anything that wasn‚Äôt good.

detailedReviews.author: Loretta Casillas
detailedReviews.text: . Love the pizza. Always perfect

detailedReviews.author: Pete Herzog
detailedReviews.text: Always enjoy their pizza. I purchase a 20 in. I have to come up with a coupon for the free cheese 12 in. especially on a Friday.

detailedReviews.author: Anton Banweg
detailedReviews.text: Ribs were overcooked and dry.

detailedReviews.author: Minh Le
detailedReviews.text: Don't order from here if you want your food in a reasonable amount of time.  Consistently late.  Last time, 2 hours and still no food.  Live 5 minutes from Mario's.  Canceled order.  Will be last time we order from them.  Area has too much good food to waste time on one with poor customer service.

detailedReviews.author: Justin Frapasella
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in North Aurora!

detailedReviews.author: Robert Tiffany
detailedReviews.text: Recently moved to North Aurora and we were looking for some pizza this past Saturday night. Decided to try Mario's. Used the Slice app on my phone. Got there on time for pick up but they were super busy and had to wait a bit. Manager / owner came out and apolgized for the delay and offered free water or pop. I Politely declined and continued to wait. A few minutes later the same gentleman came all the way out to the front with 2 boxes. He said there was some sort of glitch with the app and said it ordered twice but I was only charged for one! I said are you sure? He said yes please take them and thanked me again for my patience. The pizza was still steaming hot when we got back to the apartment, and it was really very good! Will defininately be going back to Mario's!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Dema
detailedReviews.text: Pizza here is always great.  Sauce is fantastic and options are endless.  Will continue to go here for many years to come.

detailedReviews.author: Jon Novak
detailedReviews.text: Been a long time since I‚Äôve had a pizza from Mario‚Äôs but man it was good. Need to stop back and visit again.

detailedReviews.author: Lana L
detailedReviews.text: Go to place in the area for thin crust pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Ricardo Cruz
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was great!! All ingredients tasted fresh and organic! 5/5 rating.

detailedReviews.author: Vanessa Velazquez
detailedReviews.text:
Mario‚Äôs pizza catered our sons first birthday yesterday and I can‚Äôt thank Mario enough for the delicious food. Everything was sooooo good and tasted fresh! Our guests kept going up for more and more plates that‚Äôs how delicious everything was. Mario delivered the food himself and did the whole food set up. We didn‚Äôt have to lift a finger. He took care of it all.

I can‚Äôt thank you enough Mario. We will definitely be ordering off your catering menu for future events. Not only do you guys have great pizza but all the other food on your menu is on point and never disappoints!

detailedReviews.author: Jim Smith
detailedReviews.text: Great food for the money.  Love their bbq

detailedReviews.author: Charles Swisher
detailedReviews.text:
Don't order from here if you like sauce on your pizza.
Also, does this ratio of mushrooms to ranch seem right?

detailedReviews.author: Charliee RP
detailedReviews.text: Ordered some pasta dinner thinking it was just for one person. I was shocked when I got home as it was big enough to share for 3 people. The food is delicious too

detailedReviews.author: Joen Escribano
detailedReviews.text: First off I would always get pizza from here but then I seen Mario's had a booth set up at an even and I was exited to see they had turkey legs but when I tried to order I was told they ran out and all the turkey legs where already sold to other people but then the guy behind me in line ordered one and got it right away, I will no longer support Mario's for that not even an apology when asked why I was told that.

detailedReviews.author: Shaun Reinert
detailedReviews.text: A very awesome local pizza place. Double dough is so damn good!!!

detailedReviews.author: Marsha Becker
detailedReviews.text: I work as a nurse in a nearby hospital. We ordered Calzones late evening near closing time. My first experience with Mario's Pizza restaurant. WOW. It was large enough to share; delicious crust, perfectly browned and so much filling it made me hum as I ate it. The same way small children wiggle and hum when eating their favorite dessert! Definitely my favorite place now!

detailedReviews.author: Christina Cabrera
detailedReviews.text: The staff is always  amazing.   Makes you feel like family  and that you're their only customer even when. They are slammed.  Our Friday  night  pizza is no other place but here

detailedReviews.author: Maggie Clemons-Adams
detailedReviews.text: Online ordering very easy. Order was accurate.  Service was unfriendly when arriving to the store. Got our food, pizza is below average - plenty of toppings but flavors just didn't land and extraordinarily salty. Cheesecake was frozen, without requested sauce and basically inedible.  Pity

detailedReviews.author: Denise Slack
detailedReviews.text: They're barbecue tenders are great.

detailedReviews.author: Trish
detailedReviews.text: Delicious tasting pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Alec Dorn
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery from Mario's and was impressed with the speed of delivery as well as the freshness of the pizza! It was almost as if the pizza was made right in the delivery vehicle. Went with the Pepperoni Lovers and was impressed. So much cheese and pepperoni and just the right amount of sauce. Will definitely be ordering from here again.

detailedReviews.author: LeonB ManAboutTown
detailedReviews.text: Pizza is good!!!!and they do have a rewards program!!!! Lol!!!

detailedReviews.author: Tracey Hower
detailedReviews.text: Omgosh. We have lived all over the country. Best pizza Evah. Yes, originally from the east coast. We get the pizza at least once a week. We are moving to Thailand and this pizza is definitely one of the foods we will miss the most! Go figure. This place is the real deal!

detailedReviews.author: BobbyBoMac
detailedReviews.text: Ok 1st things 1st ,I ordered eggplant parmesan dinner  and I ddnt get my salad ????? Ok I wasn't upset , then went to my cheese fries and oh so awful the cheese sauce was watered down OMG !!!! Then the eggplant parmesan was frozen meal just heated in oven . I can get the same product from Walmart s frozen section!!! So I would definitely not recommend this place to anyone

detailedReviews.author: Alex
detailedReviews.text: Tried all the pizza places around the Geneva, Batavia, and North Aurora area and this is the best by far!!

detailedReviews.author: Karissa Ormond
detailedReviews.text: Great quality ingredients! Best pizza we‚Äôve had in North Aurora yet.

detailedReviews.author: Sam Hooda
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza around North Aurora. Sauce and cheese mouth melting Wow. Keep it up.

detailedReviews.author: david wachter
detailedReviews.text: Killer thin crust.

detailedReviews.author: james krueger
detailedReviews.text: Asked for well done....wasn't....and very bland....I don't understand why they have such a high score

detailedReviews.author: Andrea Kroesen
detailedReviews.text: Really friendly service and the pizza is so good! They deliver it piping hot. Delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Sterner
detailedReviews.text: Excellent tavern cut pizza. I‚Äôve been getting Mario‚Äôs now for about a year since I moved to Batavia with my fianc√©e. Mario‚Äôs is the only Friday night pizza we ll ever need. Crust is well made and tasty, sauce is a perfect combo of savory and a hint of sweetness to balance, and toppings are fresh and delicious. If you are in their area I would highly highly recommend.

detailedReviews.author: R & P Pilz
detailedReviews.text:
Hands down the best cheese and pepperoni pizza in the area. Give 'em a try I think you'll like it
Respectfully R. Pilz

detailedReviews.author: Jim R
detailedReviews.text: Awesome, high quality pizza

detailedReviews.author: Jesus Chavez
detailedReviews.text:
The quality of the ingredients are awesomeüëå.
The cheese is full of flavor and the sausage looks and tastes amazing üëè.
Definitely worth every penny. Hats off üé©for this place

detailedReviews.author: Jason Mikel
detailedReviews.text: Best hidden pizza spot in North Aurora!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Bandel
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza. Love the ribs!

detailedReviews.author: James Powell
detailedReviews.text: Best one so far!!üòäüòä

detailedReviews.author: Ashley Ott
detailedReviews.text: Our new go to pizza place! We have finally found a pizza full of flavor, quality ingredients and plenty of them! Delicious! Can't wait to order again!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise Mario's Pizza for its friendly and welcoming staff, making it a go-to spot for many. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza at Mario's is renowned for its excellent taste, fresh toppings, and delicious crust, often outperforming competitors like Rosati's. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
Mario's Pizza offers reliable and timely service, ensuring that orders are always ready on time and delivered hot. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and inconsistent order fulfillment - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues due to poor service and food quality inconsistencies - review management can address this concern
Lack of awareness about menu offerings and promotions - social media marketing can improve this area

positive.author: Ginger76 76
positive.text:
This was my first time trying Mario's Pizza and I cannot believe it took me this long to try them.
This is a little hole in the wall pick up only place.  Nothing fancy but immediately upon entering I was greeted with a friendly smile!
We ordered 2 double dough pizzas and they were piping hot and ready right on time.

The pizza was excellent, great sauce, fresh toppings, so many options and the crust was delicious!!
I am extremely satisfied with service and pizza... I'm for sure making this my go to place for pizza!!

positive.author: Daniel Niketopoulos
positive.text: Pizza and sandwiches are absolutely delicious and Mario is one of the nicest people I've met

positive.author: Brandon Kochen
positive.text: Family favorite. Been coming here for years and years. Every time I am home I make the family order!

neutral.author: Dave Simpson
neutral.text: I have mixed feelings about this.  The pizza is very good, but the pasta dishes are so greasy that it soaked through the bag and stained my seat during the two minute ride home. This happened multiple times.  The pasta dishes were very good, except for the excessive grease.

neutral.author: Maggie Clemons-Adams
neutral.text: Online ordering very easy. Order was accurate.  Service was unfriendly when arriving to the store. Got our food, pizza is below average - plenty of toppings but flavors just didn't land and extraordinarily salty. Cheesecake was frozen, without requested sauce and basically inedible.  Pity

negative.author: K K
negative.text: Ordered a side of coleslaw and received just cabbage.

negative.author: Minh Le
negative.text: Don't order from here if you want your food in a reasonable amount of time.  Consistently late.  Last time, 2 hours and still no food.  Live 5 minutes from Mario's.  Canceled order.  Will be last time we order from them.  Area has too much good food to waste time on one with poor customer service.
